page.title: 11Llangunllo Police
page.content: Llangunllo is policed from Knighton, the nearest town. A panda car visits the centre of the village once a week to see if there are any problems. Llangunllo is a very law abiding place.It is possible to leave your house or your car unlocked and expect them to be untouched when you return. The bery compact nature of the community mitigates against criminality. Occasionally there are idiotic acts performed, usually by local boys having drunk too much _ mild vaddalism,such as moving somebody's ornamental trees around but the only real criminal acts are performed seasonally by sheep rustlers, who came from outside the local community.
